name: The Harrowing Dungeon (colbykade626)
description: This game was developed for my Game Development class midterm over the course of a week. I used CC0 assets or my own assets only for the art and sounds. In this game, you explore a dangerous dungeon in which every step you take causes you to lose health. You have to find the way out before dying from exhaustion or from the various monsters that can be found in the dungeon.
